text: This is a list of all transactions occurring in the 1997-98 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 1, 1997 to June 30, 1998), see the links below ==External links== *Basketball.RealGM.com *Basketball-Reference.com ==References== Transactions 1997-98
title: List of 1997–98 NBA season transactions
